title: There is nothing sadder than a low-ELO Yasuo
body:
Just vote up. The title says everything. How cringe is it to watch a Yasuo constantly try to make a play without understanding that he outscales everything and just needs to CS properly?

E into turret range
E everything without warding, get ganked, die
W nothing, but must because seen good things happen on Youtube
Die in lane, come back, execute exact same play, only this time, enemy has better items (repeat this step x10+)


Too much Youtube guys. Too much. Cringe & shudder.

replies.body:
Forget low-elo.

Theres nothing sadder than a Yasuo.
U better choose your next words very, very carefully.

Nothing else need be said.

That says it all.
Whenever I am matched up against Yasuo in lane, I go "YESS-uo!" then carry the game

Whenever I'm matched against one i go "ohh ffs why cant anyone just play a fucking original champion for once!"

Regardless of wether they are easy to beat or not, it gets really old playing against the same champions game after game after game.

although no one plays lissandra (i have no idea why) she is a legit really good champ (when i player her she was super squishy though.)

the worst thing is that that released "championship" **cough** douchebag **cough** zed. his back animation is literally him sitting on a throne, which makes him even more of an egotistic dickhead than draven (but i cant be mad at draven because thats what he is all about and i dont have any beef with draven players.) 
P.S {{champion:238}}  look at his head, thats a dickhole on top of his head https://cdn.meme.am/instances/20719817.jpg

P.P.S this is a spiderman thread now.
You hate us teemo players because you aint us :) ...

you want to go back to that mundo/gp/morde episode?

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Puue6NL9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-07T04:58:12.350+0000)
>
> Forget low-elo.
> 
> Theres nothing sadder than a Yasuo.

because they are all like that.

Im pretty sure that most Karthus's don't do that well either, or bards, but we don't moan about them cos theres like 1 Karthus every 100 games.

If there was only 1 Yasuo per 100 games, no one would care at all if he was shit or if he was a god.

the problem isn't that people cant play Yas well, the problem is that there are too many Yasuo's.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Puue6NL9,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-07-07T12:15:31.981+0000)
>
> Im pretty sure that most Karthus's don't do that well either, or bards, but we don't moan about them cos theres like 1 Karthus every 100 games.
> 
> If there was only 1 Yasuo per 100 games, no one would care at all if he was shit or if he was a god.
> 
> the problem isn't that people cant play Yas well, the problem is that there are too many Yasuo's.

no its not that they cant play yas well or there are too many, its that there are too many who cant play him well, its not an or thing, its both of them

I am b3 atm and the other day i was lissandra because i like the cc i can give a low elo team. A yas thought he could kill me so dived me with his dash so i just ult followed by w and bye bye yas. he dived me one more time before realising maybe i shouldnt dive a lissandra

Lissandra, specifically counters Yasuo though, its not so easy if you are Aurelion Sol or someone that doesn't have the cc or escapes to get him off you.

Dont get me wrong, id LOVE to see more Lissandra's around (I've been playing her a lot recently myself and enjoying every moment) and its great to see a fresh champ in the mid lane, but just because Yas isn't a problem for a tanky high CC champ, doesn't mean he isn't a problem for others (even in low-elo)

**HOW TO COUNTER YASUO**
Step 1: go {{champion:36}}  or {{champion:127}}  mid
Step 2: savour the moment because yasuo is feeding you.
I climbed to Gold V from S5 with mostly Lissandra lol. Barely anyone knows how to counter her.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M1HD3TsOhps
the  nightmarish 1% of yasuo players.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CoyXX6xQfc8
the other 99%.
Welcome to the League of a few legends

Sometimes they Flash into turret range wait 2 sec before actually diving you and you're recaling there watching him like 0_0 Hi!  Then he dies cause you ignited him and continue recalling xDDD True story

I've actually just spectated a bronze yasuo game.
Was somewhat really funny, and I agree with you XD

except being the low-ELO Yasuo yourself...i just get fb & feed
